TITLE: Installing Prettier Plugin for Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: Command to install the plugin and its peer dependency as dev dependencies using npm. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install -D prettier prettier-plugin-tailwindcss ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Prettier Configuration DESCRIPTION: Basic configuration to enable the Tailwind CSS plugin in Prettier. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "plugins": ["prettier-plugin-tailwindcss"] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Tailwind Stylesheet Path DESCRIPTION: Configuration for specifying the path to Tailwind CSS entry point file. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "tailwindStylesheet": "./resources/css/app.css" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Tailwind Config Path DESCRIPTION: Configuration for specifying custom Tailwind configuration file location. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "tailwindConfig": "./styles/tailwind.config.js" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Multiple Plugins Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration example for using multiple Prettier plugins together. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "plugins": [ "prettier-plugin-svelte", "prettier-plugin-organize-imports", "prettier-plugin-tailwindcss" ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom Attributes Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration for sorting classes in custom attributes using tailwindAttributes option. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "tailwindAttributes": ["myClassList"] } ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` function MyButton({ children }) { return ( ); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Function Call Class Sorting DESCRIPTION: Example of sorting classes in function calls using clsx library with tailwindFunctions configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "tailwindFunctions": ["clsx"] } ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import clsx from 'clsx' function MyButton({ isHovering, children }) { let classes = clsx( 'rounded bg-blue-500 px-4 py-2 text-base text-white', { 'bg-blue-700 text-gray-100': isHovering, }, ) return ( ) } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Template Literal Class Sorting DESCRIPTION: Configuration and examples for sorting classes in tagged template literals. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "tailwindFunctions": ["tw"] } ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { View, Text } from 'react-native' import tw from 'twrnc' function MyScreen() { return ( Hello World ) } ``` LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` const tw = (strings, ...values) => String.raw({ raw: strings }, ...values) ``` LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` const mySortedClasses = tw`bg-white p-4 dark:bg-black` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Whitespace Preservation Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration and example for preserving whitespace between classes. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "tailwindPreserveWhitespace": true } ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import clsx from 'clsx' function MyButton({ isHovering, children }) { return ( ) } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Duplicate Classes Preservation DESCRIPTION: Configuration and example for preserving duplicate classes in templating languages. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "tailwindPreserveDuplicates": true } ``` LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
